item.title: Uber sued over alleged discrimination against people with disabilities
item.description: The federal government said Friday it's suing Uber for allegedly discriminating against passengers with disabilities

item.title: Boeing workers reject their latest contract offer, extending strike at three Midwest plants
item.description: Boeing workers have rejected another contract proposal, extending their nearly six-week strike at three Midwest plants

item.title: Bessent will meet Chinese officials in Spain for trade and TikTok talks
item.description: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent is traveling to Madrid this weekend for trade talks with Chinese counterparts
